ing.item: Vegetable or chicken stock or water

directions.step:
Basics for new cooks:
In saucepan, bring water and salt to boil over high heat; stir in barley. Reduce heat to low; cover and simmer for 40 minutes or until tender and liquid has evaporated. Makes about 3 cups, or 4 servings.
Source: Canadian Living magazine, Apr 95 Presented in article by Elizabeth Baird: "Only The Best" Recipe by Canadian Living Test Kitchen
